issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Similar to HADOOP-7621, the secret should be in a file other than the configuration file.
fields.summary: HttpFS should read the hadoop-auth secret from a file instead inline from the configuration

comments.body:
-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12508126/HDFS-2707.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    +1 tests included.  The patch appears to include 6 new or modified tests.

    -1 patch.  The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/1733//console

This message is automatically generated.
new patch removes all references to Alfredo except for a few occurrences in the CHANGES files.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12508205/HDFS-2707.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    +1 tests included.  The patch appears to include 9 new or modified tests.

    -1 patch.  The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/1736//console

This message is automatically generated.
Run test-patch locally, javadoc/findbugs warnings are unrelated to the patch.

Integrated in Hadoop-Hdfs-trunk-Commit #1541 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-Hdfs-trunk-Commit/1541/])
    HDFS-2707. HttpFS should read the hadoop-auth secret from a file instead inline from the configuration. (tucu)
